posts.sub: Xenoblade X was originally going to have a predefined 25 year old male protag + more
posts.com:
http://segmentnext.com/2016/01/05/xenoblade-chronicles-x-tooka-u-turn-in-development-story-characters-world-included/

>story was rewritten halfway through development because the predefined protag was changed to a blank slate custom avatar & online multiplayer was added

>game was going to star a 25 year old male protagonist, his father 'Oyaji' & a women (possibly the MCs love interest) named Reina Sakuraba (who is related to the Sakuraba family)

>main antagonist was going to be a person named 'Black Knight'. He/she wore all black armour & a black helmet & wore a black cape & wielded a Katana sword. The antagonists ship was to be called the 'Dreadnaught' & his/her Skell could transform into a bird-like jet.

>Celica & L were originally going to play a much larger role in the story. Instead L was relegated to funny shopkeeper & Celica to pretty much just being...there when they rewrote the story.

>yfw online multiplayer gave us a shittier, weak story where antagonists have no back story or strong motivations & are killed off the second they show up, a silent blank slate avatar, Elma & Lin/Tatsu having the most screentime & always having to have them in your party, filler characters, rushed story, and more.
